mapper.select: SELECT t1.channel_name AS NAME, t1.count, t2.count2, IF ( t1.count = 0, 0, t2.count2 / t1.count ) AS available FROM ( SELECT tc.channel_id, tc.channel_name, count( tcl.clue_id ) AS count FROM tienchin_channel tc LEFT JOIN tienchin_clue tcl ON tc.channel_id = tcl.channel_id and tcl.create_time BETWEEN #{params.beginTime} and #{params.endTime} GROUP BY tc.channel_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tc.channel_id, tc.channel_name, count( tcl.clue_id ) AS count2 FROM tienchin_channel tc LEFT JOIN tienchin_clue tcl ON tc.channel_id = tcl.channel_id and tcl.create_time BETWEEN #{params.beginTime} and #{params.endTime} AND tcl.`status` != 4 GROUP BY tc.channel_id ) t2 ON t1.channel_id = t2.channel_id
